property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take up to 2 non-evolution Light Bringers that cost 3 or less and put them into the battle zone for no cost. Then shuffle your deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your 20px (Magic Soul) or 20px (Kung Fu Soul) creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have 3000 power or less. Then draw a card for each creature destroyed in this way. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Double Shield Plus—Whenever you put other creatures that have "500" as the last 3 digits of their power into the battle zone, you may add up to 2 cards from the top of your deck under one of your shields face down. (Each card stack is still considered to be one shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Holy Field (If you have more shields than your opponent, this spell gets the following ​{HOLY FIELD}ability.): {HOLY FIELD}Instead of tapping one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, tap up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {CHAIN} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature that costs less than this creature, you may put it into the battle zone. If you don't, return it to the top of your deck.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each other creature in the battle zone gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy all creatures that have power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {REVENGE CHANCE}- At the end of each player's turn, if your opponent put 3 or more creatures into the battle zone that turn,you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Dimension Horn, of the Temporal Foundation

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy this creature. Then put up to 2 nature psychic creatures that have total cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ You may choose one or more cards from your opponent's graveyard. If you do, your opponent adds those cards to their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has "blocker" and up to 2 cards in your opponent's graveyard. Your opponent puts the chosen cards on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ If you don't have an Angel Command or Demon Command in the battle zone, this creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is awakened, draw a card. ■ Loop Awaken—When a fire creature is put into the battle zone during your turn, flip this creature to the Crimson Lord Janus, Temporal Warpanther side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is awakened, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
